title: Explainer – Arrest of Sri Lanka’s powerful spymaster Suresh Salley
byline: Salley was one of the trusted army generals by ex-leader Gotabaya Rajapaksa since his defence secretary appointment

title: Sri Lanka stocks edge up, as diversified financials, capital goods push turnover
byline: The market turnover was 4.02 billion rupees.

title: Sri Lanka Treasury bill yields drop across maturities, less bills sold
byline: 67.8 billion rupees sold of an offered 90 billion.

title: Sri Lanka to roll out digital ID by late 2026, ‘super app’ in pipeline
byline: Parallel to the ID rollout, a 'super app' is being designed to consolidate state services into a single platform.

title: IMF rep warns Sri Lanka’s success is "not a finished story" at investor forum
byline: Investor Forum 2026 by Softlogic Stockbrokers brought industry experts to discuss macroeconomic outlook

title: Sri Lanka to bring digital economy, cyber security laws
byline: “We are looking forward to introducing two new institutions through these acts,” Weeraratne said.

title: Sri Lanka to amend social security contribution levy act
byline: Minister did not say whether the levy will be increased or reduced

title: Sri Lanka to allow exporters to invest in domestic dollar bonds
byline: Intended to increase demand, broaden the government’s foreign currency funding base and improve competitive pricing

title: Sri Lanka rupee flat, bond yields recover
byline: Bond yields edged down slightly across the board.

title: Sri Lanka’s NTB profits down 6 pct in December 2025 quarter
byline: The Bank's HSBC deal transaction scheduled to conclude in second quarter of this year

title: Malaysian Airlines to start self check-in counters in Sri Lanka’s BIA soon: sources
byline: State-owned SriLankan,  Singapore Airlines are have already rolled out self check-in counters at BIA
